H0.text: Iodine is added to table salt to prevent what. Thyroid Cancer

H1.text: Iodine is added to table salt to prevent what. Hypothyroidism

H2.text: Iodine is added to table salt to prevent what. Cretinism

H3.text: Iodine is added to table salt to prevent what. Goider

A4.text: Iodine deficiency causes thyroid gland problems, including endemic goitre.

A5.text: The ingestion of iodine prevents iodine deficiency. Worldwide, iodine deficiency affects about two billion people and is the leading preventable cause of intellectual and developmental disabilities.

A6.text: Iodine intake is a risk factor for thyroid cancer.

A7.text: Adding iodine to table salt has largely eliminated preventable intellectual disability in wealthier nations.

A8.text: Prevention of hypothyroidism includes adding iodine to table salt.
